title: 255 - Creative Lift: How to Find Your Ultimate Gift and Takeoff!

Head to http://storyblocks.com/CreativePepTalk to learn more about Storyblocks Video today.

 

COTTON BUREAU
This episode is also brought to you by Cotton Bureau!

ARTISTS OF ALL KINDS: you can go to cottonbureau.com and upload your t-shirt design today and start selling your t-shirt designs in minutes. They are high quality, you can sell them right through their marketplace and They even use a fancy printing process which means you can print in full color without sacrificing quality. Go to cottonbureau.com now to start selling your designs on demand today.

 

Freshbooks
Freshbooks is accounting software specifically designed for small businesses. They make invoicing, expenses, payments, accounting, estimates, proposals extremely easy. Do yourself a favor, streamline the admin side of your creative business today and go to Freshbooks.com/creativepep to get a 30 day free trial and don’t forget to enter Creative Pep Talk in the “how did you hear about us section”
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Creative Pep Talk)

itunes:title: 255 - Creative Lift: How to Find Your Ultimate Gift and Takeoff!
itunes:author: Creative Pep Talk
itunes:summary:
We’ve talked nonstop about putting in the work but we have NEVER addressed the scariest elephant in the room: TALENT.

I’d be lying if I said that my true creative heroes didn’t have some form of talent.

In fact, the creatives that most light me up, all seem to have some transcendent innate super strength!

This is often discouraging for most of us because when we start making creative work we are faced with this uncomfortable truth: we are not supernatural!!!

In this episode I want to share my new mindset and set of tactics that have helped me reconcile this problem in my own path.

This breakthrough has enabled newfound creative fuel for my journey and ultimately, unlocked what I believe to be path to finding your own supernatural creative strengths!!! LET’S GO!
